name: Alshibani Seafood
address: 1812 White Plains Rd, Bronx, NY 10462, USA

reviews.text: I was charged for everything that i ordered when i got home half of my order was missing and the food wasn‚Äôt as good as I expected. This is My first and last time ordering food from this restaurant üòí.
You can feed three people comfortably

This is the best seafood I have had.so simple yet so delicious. Cooked to perfection.smell of charcoal is great.looking forward to coming back soon and repeat.exceptional food. Service is outstanding.Gem in the Bronx.
The salona was very well cooked with the yemeni tandoori bread it was perfect

Amazing seafood and great atmosphere!
I had an incredible experience at this restaurant. The seafood was unbelievably fresh ‚Äî the grilled shrimp and lobster were perfectly cooked, tender, and full of flavor. The staff were friendly and attentive without being intrusive, and the place had a cozy, coastal vibe that made the whole evening feel special. You can really tell they care about quality and presentation. Definitely one of the best seafood spots I‚Äôve been to ‚Äî can‚Äôt wait to come back!

Absolutely loved the food at Alshibani Seafood! Everything was fresh, flavorful, and perfectly seasoned. The fish was tender and juicy, and the sauces had that perfect balance of spice and depth.
Must try the salta with shrimp and fish.
And sea food soup
Service was friendly and quick, and the place had a clean, welcoming atmosphere.
Highly recommend the grilled fish ‚Äî both were outstanding! Definitely one of the best seafood spots around.

A great project to fulfill the community needs of a seafood restaurant that provide great service and give us the opportunity to enjoy a diverse and delicious dishes, especially when it comes to the Yemeni Seafood Cuisine.

I enjoyed the food and I give it 4 stars just because Its not easy to find a good quality fish at the USA and this small business tried their best.

Amazing service, amazing food , everyone is so nice love how the chef comes out to check on everyone explains all the dishes the employees are super helpful if you don‚Äôt know what a dish is I really recommend everyone to come here you would not be disappointed !

Beautiful place. Friendly staff. Fresh food. Delicious food. Family friendly.
